text: The cantons of Gap are administrative divisions of the Hautes-Alpes department, in southeastern France. Since the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015, the town of Gap is subdivided into 4 cantons. Their seat is in Gap.Décret n° 2014-193 du 20 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département des Hautes-Alpes == Population == {| class="wikitable" ! Name !!
